trans-unit.source: Allows an object to implement a DataAdapter, and represents a set of methods and mapping action-related properties that are used to fill and update a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> and update a data source.
trans-unit.target: 允许对象实现 DataAdapter，和表示一组方法和映射操作相关的属性，用于填充和更新的<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>和更新数据源。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Data.IDbDataAdapter"></xref> instances are for data sources that are (or resemble) relational databases with textual commands (like [!INCLUDE[tsql](~/add/includes/tsql-md.md)]), while IDataAdapter instances could can use any type of data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.IDbDataAdapter"></xref>实例是否为数据源 （或类似于） 使用文本命令的关系数据库 (如[!INCLUDE[tsql](~/add/includes/tsql-md.md)])，而 IDataAdapter 实例可以使用任何类型的数据源。

trans-unit.source: The IDataAdapter interface allows an inheriting class to implement a DataAdapter class, which represents the bridge between a data source and a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: IDataAdapter 接口允许继承类实现 DataAdapter 类，该类表示数据源和一种<xref:System.Data.DataSet>。</xref:System.Data.DataSet>之间桥

trans-unit.source: For more information about DataAdapter classes, see [Populating a DataSet from a DataAdapter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关 DataAdapter 类的详细信息，请参阅[填充数据集从 DataAdapter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: An application does not create an instance of the IDataAdapter interface directly, but implements an instance of a class that inherits IDataAdapter.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序不会直接创建 IDataAdapter 接口的实例，但实现继承 IDataAdapter 的类的实例。

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit IDataAdapter must implement the inherited members, and they typically define additional members to add provider-specific functionality.
trans-unit.target: 继承 IDataAdapter 的类必须实现继承的成员，且通常会定义其他成员来添加提供程序特定的功能。

trans-unit.source: For example, the IDataAdapter interface defines a <xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter.Fill%2A> method that takes a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 例如，IDataAdapter 接口定义<xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter.Fill%2A>采用的方法<xref:System.Data.DataSet>作为参数。</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter.Fill%2A>

trans-unit.source: In turn, the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> class inherits the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> method and also defines two additional overloads of the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> method that take an ADO Recordset object as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 反过来，<xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>类继承<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>方法和还定义了两个其他重载<xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.Fill%2A>作为参数的 ADO 记录集对象的方法。</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Fill%2A> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: Adds or updates rows in the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> to match those in the data source using the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> name, and creates a <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> named "Table".
trans-unit.target: 添加或更新中的行<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>以匹配在数据源中使用<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>名称，然后创建<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>名为"Table"。

trans-unit.source: Fill retrieves rows from the data source using the SELECT statement specified by an associated <xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 填充从数据源使用指定的一个关联的 SELECT 语句中检索行<xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>属性。</xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The connection object associated with the SELECT statement must be valid, but it does not need to be open.
trans-unit.target: 与 SELECT 语句关联的连接对象必须是有效，但它不需要处于打开状态。

trans-unit.source: If the connection is closed before Fill is called, it is opened to retrieve data, then closed.
trans-unit.target: 如果连接已关闭调用填充之前，其打开以检索数据，然后再将关闭。

trans-unit.source: If the connection is open before Fill is called, it remains open.
trans-unit.target: 如果连接是打开的调用填充之前，它保持打开状态。

trans-unit.source: The Fill operation then adds the rows to destination <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, creating the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects if they do not already exist.
trans-unit.target: 然后该填充操作的行添加到目标<xref:System.Data.DataTable>中的对象<xref:System.Data.DataSet>，则创建<xref:System.Data.DataTable>对象如果它们尚不存在。</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: When creating <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects, the Fill operation usually creates only column name metadata.
trans-unit.target: 在创建时<xref:System.Data.DataTable>对象，该填充操作通常会创建唯一的列名称元数据。</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: However, if the <xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A> property is set to `AddWithKey`, appropriate primary keys and constraints are also created.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果<xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A>属性设置为`AddWithKey`，还会创建相应的主键约束。</xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter.MissingSchemaAction%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the `SelectCommand` returns the results of an OUTER JOIN, the `DataAdapter` does not set a <xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A> value for the resulting <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`SelectCommand`返回 OUTER JOIN 的结果`DataAdapter`未设置<xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A>为生成<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。</xref:System.Data.DataTable>值</xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must explicitly define the primary key to ensure that duplicate rows are resolved correctly.
trans-unit.target: 您必须显式定义为主键，以确保正确解析重复行。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Defining Primary Keys](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[定义主键](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter> encounters duplicate columns while populating a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, it generates names for the successive columns, using the pattern "columnname1", "columnname2", "columnname3", and so on.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter>填充时遇到重复的列<xref:System.Data.DataTable>，它会生成名称为连续列，请使用模式"columnname1"、"columnname2"、"columnname3"，依次类推。</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: If the incoming data contains unnamed columns, they are put in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> according to the pattern "Column1", "Column2", and so on.
trans-unit.target: 如果传入的数据包含未命名的列，它们都将置于<xref:System.Data.DataSet>根据模式"Column1"、"Column2"等。</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: When multiple result sets are added to the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, each result set is put in a separate table.
trans-unit.target: 多个结果集添加到时<xref:System.Data.DataSet>，每个结果集放在单独的表。</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: Additional result sets are named by appending integral values to the specified table name (for example, "Table", "Table1", "Table2", and so on).
trans-unit.target: 额外的结果集通过将整数值追加到指定的表名 （例如，"表"、"Table1"、"Table2"等） 进行命名。

trans-unit.source: Applications should use caution when using column and table names to ensure that conflicts with these naming patterns do not occur.
trans-unit.target: 使用列和表名以确保不会发生冲突，这些命名模式时，应用程序应小心。

trans-unit.source: When the SELECT statement that is used to populate the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> returns multiple results, such as a batch SQL statement, if one of the results contains an error, all successive results are skipped and not added to the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: 当 SELECT 语句用于填充<xref:System.Data.DataSet>返回多个结果，如一批 SQL 语句中，如果其中一个结果包含错误，所有的后续结果跳过并且不添加到<xref:System.Data.DataSet>。</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: You can use the Fill method multiple times on the same <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用的填充方法多次<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: If a primary key exists, incoming rows are merged with matching rows that already exist.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在主键，传入行与已存在的匹配行合并。

trans-unit.source: If no primary key exists, incoming rows are appended to the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 如果不存在任何主键，传入行追加到<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When handling batch SQL statements that return multiple results, the implementation of Fill and <xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A> for a .NET Framework data provider retrieves schema information for only the first result.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 时处理批处理 SQL 语句返回多个结果，填充的实现和<xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>.NET Framework 数据提供程序检索仅第一个结果的架构信息。</xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter.FillSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> to fill with records and, if necessary, schema.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>填写记录，如有必要，架构。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows successfully added to or refreshed in the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 行数已成功添加到或在刷新<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This does not include rows affected by statements that do not return rows.
trans-unit.target: 这不包括由语句不返回行受影响的行。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> named "Table" to the specified <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> and configures the schema to match that in the data source based on the specified <xref href="System.Data.SchemaType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 将添加<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>名指定为"Table" <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>和配置架构的架构以匹配数据源中根据指定<xref href="System.Data.SchemaType"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The FillSchema method retrieves the schema from the data source using the <xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: FillSchema 方法从数据源使用<xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>中检索架构

trans-unit.source: The connection object associated with the <xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> must be valid, but it does not need to be open.
trans-unit.target: 与相关的连接对象<xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>必须有效，但它不需要才能打开。</xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the connection is closed before FillSchema is called, it is opened to retrieve data, then closed.
trans-unit.target: 如果连接已关闭调用 FillSchema 之前，其打开以检索数据，然后再将关闭。

trans-unit.source: If the connection is open before FillSchema is called, it remains open.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用 FillSchema 之前它保持打开状态。

trans-unit.source: A FillSchema operation adds a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> to the destination <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: FillSchema 操作将添加<xref:System.Data.DataTable>到目标<xref:System.Data.DataSet>.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: It then adds columns to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumnCollection> of the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> and configures the following <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> properties if they exist at the data source: - <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull%2A> - <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它添加到列<xref:System.Data.DataColumnCollection>的<xref:System.Data.DataTable>并配置以下<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>如果它们在数据源中存在的属性:- <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull%2A>- <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrement%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AllowDBNull%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataColumnCollection>

trans-unit.source: You must set <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrementStep%2A> and <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrementSeed%2A> separately.
trans-unit.target: 必须设置<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrementStep%2A>和<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrementSeed%2A>单独。</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrementSeed%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.AutoIncrementStep%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.MaxLength%2A> - <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A> - <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Unique%2A> FillSchema also configures the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A> and <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Constraints%2A> properties according to the following rules: - If one or more primary key columns are returned by the <xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>, they are used as the primary key columns for the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.MaxLength%2A>- <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A>- <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Unique%2A>FillSchema 还配置<xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A>和<xref:System.Data.DataTable.Constraints%2A>属性根据下列规则:-如果一个或多个主键列返回的<xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>、 用作<xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>的主键列</xref:System.Data.IDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A></xref:System.Data.DataTable.Constraints%2A></xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A></xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Unique%2A></xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A></xref:System.Data.DataColumn.MaxLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If no primary key columns are returned but unique columns are, the unique columns are used as the primary key if all the unique columns are non-nullable.
trans-unit.target: -在返回任何主键列但唯一列，如果唯一的所有列都都不可以为 null，为主键都将使用唯一的列。

trans-unit.source: If any of the columns are nullable, a <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> is added to the <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection>, but the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何列都可以为 null，<xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>添加到<xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection>，但<xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A>未设置属性。</xref:System.Data.DataTable.PrimaryKey%2A> </xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection> </xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>

trans-unit.source: - If both primary key columns and unique columns are returned, the primary key columns are used as the primary key columns for the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: -如果返回主键列和唯一列，以联系<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。</xref:System.Data.DataTable>使用作为主键列的主键列

trans-unit.source: Note that primary keys and unique constraints are added to the <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection> according to the previous rules, but other constraint types are not added.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，主键和唯一约束添加到<xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection>根据以前的规则，但其他约束类型不会添加。</xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection>

trans-unit.source: If a unique clustered index is defined on a column or columns in a SQL Server table and the primary key constraint is defined on a separate set of columns, then the names of the columns in the clustered index will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果唯一聚集索引定义的一列或 SQL Server 表中的列，并且对一组单独的列，定义主键约束，则将返回的聚集索引中列的名称。

trans-unit.source: To return the name or names of the primary key columns, use a query hint with the SELECT statement that specifies the name of the primary key index.
trans-unit.target: 若要返回的名称或主键列的名称，用于指定主键索引的名称的 SELECT 语句中的查询提示。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to specify query hints, see [Query Hint (Transact-SQL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms181714.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何指定查询提示的详细信息，请参阅[查询提示 (TRANSACT-SQL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms181714.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter> encounters duplicate columns while populating a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, it generates names for the successive columns, using the pattern "columnname1", "columnname2", "columnname3", and so on.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter>填充时遇到重复的列<xref:System.Data.DataTable>，它会生成名称为连续列，请使用模式"columnname1"、"columnname2"、"columnname3"，依次类推。</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: If the incoming data contains unnamed columns, they are put in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> according to the pattern "Column1", "Column2", and so on.
trans-unit.target: 如果传入的数据包含未命名的列，它们都将置于<xref:System.Data.DataSet>根据模式"Column1"、"Column2"等。</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: When multiple result sets are added to the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, each result set is put in a separate table.
trans-unit.target: 多个结果集添加到时<xref:System.Data.DataSet>，每个结果集放在单独的表。</xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: Additional result sets are named by appending integral values to the specified table name (for example, "Table", "Table1", "Table2", and so on).
trans-unit.target: 额外的结果集通过将整数值追加到指定的表名 （例如，"表"、"Table1"、"Table2"等） 进行命名。

trans-unit.source: Applications should use caution when using column and table names to ensure that conflicts with these naming patterns do not occur.
trans-unit.target: 使用列和表名以确保不会发生冲突，这些命名模式时，应用程序应小心。

trans-unit.source: FillSchema returns no rows.
trans-unit.target: FillSchema 返回任何行。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter.Fill%2A> method to add rows to a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter.Fill%2A>方法以将行添加到一种<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter.Fill%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> to be filled with the schema from the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>要填充数据源的架构。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.SchemaType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Data.SchemaType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> objects that contain schema information returned from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 数组<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>从数据源返回包含架构信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parameters set by the user when executing an SQL SELECT statement.
trans-unit.target: 获取在执行 SQL SELECT 语句时，由用户设置的参数。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Data.IDataParameter"></xref> objects that contains the parameters set by the user.
trans-unit.target: 数组<xref href="System.Data.IDataParameter"></xref>由用户设置对象包含的参数。

trans-unit.source: Indicates or specifies whether unmapped source tables or columns are passed with their source names in order to be filtered or to raise an error.
trans-unit.target: 指示或指定是否未映射的源的表或列都传递与其源名一起以进行筛选或引发错误。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter.TableMappings%2A> property provides the master mapping between the returned records and the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter.TableMappings%2A>属性提供了返回的记录和<xref:System.Data.DataSet>.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>之间的主映射</xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter.TableMappings%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.MissingMappingAction"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Data.MissingMappingAction"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Passthrough" name="Passthrough" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_Passthrough" name="Passthrough" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value set is not one of the <xref href="System.Data.MissingMappingAction"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 设置的值不是一个<xref href="System.Data.MissingMappingAction"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Indicates or specifies whether missing source tables, columns, and their relationships are added to the dataset schema, ignored, or cause an error to be raised.
trans-unit.target: 指示或指定是否缺少源表、 列和它们之间的关系添加到数据集架构，将被忽略，或导致引发引发错误。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Data.MissingSchemaAction"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Data.MissingSchemaAction"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Add" name="Add" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_Add" name="Add" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value set is not one of the <xref href="System.Data.MissingSchemaAction"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 设置的值不是一个<xref href="System.Data.MissingSchemaAction"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Indicates how a source table is mapped to a dataset table.
trans-unit.target: 指示源表映射到数据集表的方式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter> uses only the mappings for the source table named "Table".
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter>仅映射用于名为"Table"的源表。</xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: All SELECT, INSERT, DELETE, and UPDATE statements returning data must do so using consistent column naming.
trans-unit.target: 所有 SELECT、 INSERT、 DELETE 和 UPDATE 语句返回的数据必须使用来完成一致列命名。

trans-unit.source: The column names returned in the records must be unique, otherwise columns with duplicate names overwrite previous data.
trans-unit.target: 返回记录中的列名称必须是唯一的否则具有相同名称的列覆盖以前的数据。

trans-unit.source: On <xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter.Update%2A>, only the table mapped to the source table named "Table" will have its changes reconciled.
trans-unit.target: 上<xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter.Update%2A>、 表映射到名为"Table"的源表将具有已对帐其更改只。</xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: A collection that provides the master mapping between the returned records and the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一个集合，提供返回的记录之间的主映射和<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空集合。

trans-unit.source: Calls the respective INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements for each inserted, updated, or deleted row in the specified <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> from a <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> named "Table".
trans-unit.target: 调用相应的 INSERT、 UPDATE 或 DELETE 语句，为每个插入、 更新或删除行中指定<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>从<xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>名为"Table"。

trans-unit.source: When an application calls the Update method, the <xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter> examines the <xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A> property, and executes the required INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements iteratively for each row, based on the order of the indexes configured in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序调用更新方法，<xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter>检查<xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A>属性，并执行所需的 INSERT、 UPDATE 或 DELETE 语句以迭代方式对于每一行，根据在<xref:System.Data.DataSet>.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>中配置的索引顺序</xref:System.Data.DataRow.RowState%2A></xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: For example, Update might execute a DELETE statement, followed by an INSERT statement, and then another DELETE statement, because of the ordering of the rows in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，更新可能会执行 DELETE 语句，接着是 INSERT 语句，则另一个 DELETE 语句，由于<xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>中行的排序

trans-unit.source: Be aware that these statements are not performed as a batch process; each row is updated individually.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，作为批处理进程; 不执行这些语句单独更新每个行。

trans-unit.source: An application can call the <xref:System.Data.DataSet.GetChanges%2A> method if you must control the sequence of statement types (for example, INSERTs before UPDATEs).
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以调用<xref:System.Data.DataSet.GetChanges%2A>方法如果你必须控制的语句类型 （例如，插入更新之前） 的序列。</xref:System.Data.DataSet.GetChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Updating Data Sources with DataAdapters](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 Dataadapter 更新数据源](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: If INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements have not been specified, the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.Update%2A> method generates an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未指定 INSERT、 UPDATE 或 DELETE 语句，<xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.Update%2A>方法生成异常。</xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, you can create a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder> or <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> object to automatically generate SQL statements for single-table updates if you set the `SelectCommand` property of a .NET Framework data provider.
trans-unit.target: 但是，你可以创建<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>或<xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>对象以自动生成单表更新的 SQL 语句，如果你设置`SelectCommand`.NET Framework 数据提供程序的属性。</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Then, any additional SQL statements that you do not set are generated by the CommandBuilder.
trans-unit.target: 然后，由 CommandBuilder 生成未设置任何其他 SQL 语句。

trans-unit.source: This generation logic requires key column information to be present in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: 此生成的逻辑需要要<xref:System.Data.DataSet>.</xref:System.Data.DataSet>中存在的键列信息

trans-unit.source: For more information see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息请参阅[使用 Commandbuilder 生成命令](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.Update%2A> method retrieves rows from the table listed in the first mapping before performing an update.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.Update%2A>方法从第一个映射，然后再执行更新中列出的表中检索行。</xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.Update%2A> then updates the row using the value of the <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand.UpdatedRowSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.Update%2A>然后更新使用的值的行<xref:System.Data.IDbCommand.UpdatedRowSource%2A>属性。</xref:System.Data.IDbCommand.UpdatedRowSource%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any additional rows returned are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 将忽略所有附加的行返回。

trans-unit.source: After any data is loaded back into the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.OnRowUpdated%2A> event is raised, allowing the user to inspect the reconciled <xref:System.Data.DataSet> row and any output parameters returned by the command.
trans-unit.target: 任何数据加载回后<xref:System.Data.DataSet>、<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.OnRowUpdated%2A>引发事件时，允许用户检查经协调<xref:System.Data.DataSet>行和任何输出参数返回命令。</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.OnRowUpdated%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: After a row updates successfully, the changes to that row are accepted.
trans-unit.target: 行已成功更新后，会接受对该行的更改。

trans-unit.source: When using Update, the order of execution is as follows: 1.
trans-unit.target: 使用更新，执行顺序时，如下所示︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: The values in the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> are moved to the parameter values.
trans-unit.target: 中的值<xref:System.Data.DataRow>移动到的参数值。</xref:System.Data.DataRow>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.OnRowUpdating%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.OnRowUpdating%2A>引发事件。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.OnRowUpdating%2A>

trans-unit.source: The command executes.
trans-unit.target: 该命令执行。

trans-unit.source: If the command is set to `FirstReturnedRecord`, then the first returned result is put in the <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.
trans-unit.target: 如果该命令设置为`FirstReturnedRecord`，则第一个返回结果置于<xref:System.Data.DataRow>.</xref:System.Data.DataRow>

trans-unit.source: If there are output parameters, they are put in the <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有输出参数，它们都将置于<xref:System.Data.DataRow>.</xref:System.Data.DataRow>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.OnRowUpdated%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.OnRowUpdated%2A>引发事件。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.OnRowUpdated%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A>调用。</xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each command associated with the <xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter> usually has a parameter collection associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 与<xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter>通常具有与其相关联的参数集合</xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter>关联的每个命令

trans-unit.source: Parameters are mapped to the current row through the `SourceColumn` and `SourceVersion` properties of a .NET Framework data provider's `Parameter` class.
trans-unit.target: 参数映射到当前行通过`SourceColumn`和`SourceVersion`的.NET Framework 数据提供程序的属性`Parameter`类。

trans-unit.source: `SourceColumn` refers to a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> column that the <xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter> references to obtain parameter values for the current row.
trans-unit.target: `SourceColumn`是指<xref:System.Data.DataTable>列，<xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter>获取当前行的参数值的引用。</xref:System.Data.IDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: `SourceColumn` refers to the unmapped column name before any table mappings have been applied.
trans-unit.target: `SourceColumn`在应用任何表映射之前是指未映射的列名称。

trans-unit.source: If `SourceColumn` refers to a nonexistent column, the action taken depends on one of the following <xref:System.Data.MissingMappingAction> values.
trans-unit.target: 如果`SourceColumn`引用不存在的列中，执行的操作取决于下列情况之一<xref:System.Data.MissingMappingAction>值。</xref:System.Data.MissingMappingAction>

trans-unit.source: |Enumeration Value|Action Taken| |-----------------------|------------------| |`MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`|Use the source column names and table names in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> if no mapping is present.| |`MissingMappingAction.Ignore`|A <xref:System.SystemException> is generated.
trans-unit.target: |枚举值 |执行操作 | |-----------------------|------------------| |`MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`|如果不不存在任何映射在<xref:System.Data.DataSet>中使用的源列名称和表名称。 | |`MissingMappingAction.Ignore`|A<xref:System.SystemException>生成。</xref:System.SystemException> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: When the mappings are explicitly set, a missing mapping for an input parameter is usually caused by an error.| |`MissingMappingAction.Error`|A <xref:System.SystemException> is generated.| The `SourceColumn` property is also used to map the value for output or input/output parameters back to the `DataSet`.
trans-unit.target: 当显式设置映射时，缺少映射的输入的参数通常是错误的原因。 | |`MissingMappingAction.Error`|生成<xref:System.SystemException>。 | `SourceColumn`属性还用于映射输出的值或输入/输出参数回`DataSet`。</xref:System.SystemException>

trans-unit.source: An exception is generated if it refers to a nonexistent column.
trans-unit.target: 如果它引用不存在的列，则会生成异常。

trans-unit.source: The `SourceVersion` property of a .NET Framework data provider's `Parameter` class determines whether to use the `Original`, `Current`, or `Proposed` version of the column value.
trans-unit.target: `SourceVersion`的.NET Framework 数据提供程序的属性`Parameter`类确定是否使用`Original`， `Current`，或`Proposed`的列值的版本。

trans-unit.source: This capability is frequently used to include original values in the WHERE clause of an UPDATE statement to check for optimistic concurrency violations.
trans-unit.target: 此功能常用要包含在 UPDATE 语句，以检查存在开放式并发冲突的 WHERE 子句中的原始值。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If an error occurs while updating a row, an exception is thrown and execution of the update is discontinued.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 更新行时出错，如果引发异常，并执行更新，则停止。

trans-unit.source: To continue the update operation without generating exceptions when an error is encountered, set the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.ContinueUpdateOnError%2A> property to `true` before calling <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要继续执行更新操作不会遇到错误时生成异常，设置<xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.ContinueUpdateOnError%2A>属性`true`之前调用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DataAdapter.ContinueUpdateOnError%2A>

trans-unit.source: You may also respond to errors on a per-row basis within the `RowUpdated` event of a DataAdapter.
trans-unit.target: 你还可能响应中的每个行基础上的错误`RowUpdated`DataAdapter 事件。

trans-unit.source: To continue the update operation without generating an exception within the `RowUpdated` event, set the <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Status%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs> to <xref:System.Data.UpdateStatus>.
trans-unit.target: 若要继续执行更新操作而不生成了异常`RowUpdated`事件中，设置<xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Status%2A><xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs>到<xref:System.Data.UpdateStatus>。</xref:System.Data.UpdateStatus></xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs>属性</xref:System.Data.Common.RowUpdatedEventArgs.Status%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> used to update the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>用于更新数据源。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows successfully updated from the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已成功从更新的行数<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to execute an INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statement resulted in zero records affected.
trans-unit.target: 尝试执行的 INSERT、 UPDATE 或 DELETE 语句导致受影响的零个记录。
